text:
A preprint entitled "Value Gradients with Action Adaptive Search Trees in Continuous (PO)MDPs" has been published on arXiv:
https://t.co/KAJzzaeWjJ

A preprint entitled "Action-Consistent Decentralized Belief Space Planning with Inconsistent Beliefs and Limited Data Sharing: Framework and Simplification Algorithms with Formal Guarantees" has been published on arXiv:
https://t.co/aNUhhPqMBN

The paper "Simplified POMDP Planning with an Alternative Observation Space and Formal Performance Guarantees" has been accepted to ISRR 2024.

https://t.co/bySTw28n7R

The paper "No Compromise in Solution Quality: Speeding Up Belief-dependent Continuous POMDPs via Adaptive Multilevel Simplification,‚Äù has been officially published by the International Journal of Robotics Research (IJRR). 
https://t.co/MmgCOYRvAH
